title: Improper Input Validation of `-database` Parameter
description: Gh-ost version <= 1.1.2 allows users to inject DSN strings via the -database parameter.This is a low severity vulnerability as the attacker must have access to the target host or trick an administrator into executing a malicious gh-ost command on a host running gh-ost, plus network access from host running gh-ost to the attack's malicious MySQL server.
impact: This issue may lead to arbitrary local file read.
more: If you have any questions or comments about this advisory:github/gh-ost : https://github.com/github/gh-ost
